Subject: Performance Review - [Associate's Name]

Dear Ms. Jan,

I trust this communication finds you in good health. I am writing to you today to address certain concerns pertaining to the recent performance of [Associate's Name], with the objective of ensuring that individual receives the requisite support and resources necessary for professional development.

Specifically, observations indicate that [Associate's Name]'s performance has not met expectations in the following areas: [Clearly list 2-3 specific examples, e.g., failure to meet established deadlines for project X, consistent lack of punctuality at scheduled team meetings, failure to attain sales targets for Q3].

This underperformance is impacting [Clearly explain the impact, e.g., the team's collective productivity, client satisfaction levels, or project timelines]. It is imperative that these issues are addressed expeditiously in order to mitigate any further adverse consequences.

To facilitate the improvement of [Associate's Name]'s performance, I recommend the following actions: [Suggest specific actions, e.g., the development of a performance improvement plan with measurable and attainable goals, the provision of additional training on [specific skill], the assignment of a designated mentor].

Demonstrable improvement in these areas is expected within the next [Number] weeks. Please contact me no later than [Date] to discuss a comprehensive plan of action. I may be reached at [Your Phone Number]. I am confident that, with dedicated effort and appropriate support, [Associate's Name] will be able to meet the established expectations.

Sincerely,

User

Best regards
